thread.title: Abandoned bra mailed - Review
thread.title_full: Abandoned bra mailed - Review of Hotel Choiseul Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Barbara P
title: Abandoned bra mailed - Review
text: My room was very small, quiet and clean. In fact, so small that I hadn't noticed that I had dropped a black bra under the bed. It wasn't until I got home, unpacked and found the bra not there.. I emailed the hotel, they had found the bra, and were waiting for mailing instructions from me. They graciously mailed it to me. And before I arrived, I had asked how close I would be for transportation to the airport. They emailed wonderful directions. It is only a couple of blocks from the airport bus pickup. The staff is just wonderful.
